title.rendered: CBA Services Private Limited Empowers Women through Reproductive Health Education and Entrepreneurship Development

content.rendered:
CBA Services Private Limited Empowers Women through Reproductive Health Education and Entrepreneurship Development

CBA Services Private Limited has entered into a partnership with Smile Foundation’s Swabhiman programme, which focuses on empowering women through reproductive health awareness and entrepreneurship development 

This project located in Devanahalli, Bengaluru has a threefold objective. Firstly, it aims to generate awareness of the crucial issues of reproductive and sexual health among women and adolescent girls. By providing information, education, and counseling, the project equips them with the knowledge to make informed decisions about their reproductive health.

Secondly, the project focuses on building confidence and assertiveness in adolescent girls and young women, encouraging them to challenge gender stereotypes and improve their overall health and social status. Through various capacity-building initiatives, workshops, and mentoring, the project aims to empower these individuals to overcome societal barriers and fulfill their potential.

Thirdly, the project aims to improve the health-seeking behavior of the target group concerning reproductive and sexual health. By promoting a proactive approach to seeking healthcare services, the project strives to ensure better health outcomes for women and adolescent girls.

In terms of reach, the project aspires to impact 5,000 women and adolescent girls from identified marginalized communities through reproductive health education and services. Additionally, it aims to provide entrepreneurship development training to 200 women from underprivileged sections of society, equipping them with the skills and knowledge needed to establish and sustain their own businesses.

The support of CBA Services Private Limited to Smile Foundation’s Swabhiman programme demonstrates their commitment to women empowerment and improving reproductive health outcomes. By combining efforts, resources, and expertise, both organizations are making a significant impact on the lives of women in Devanahalli, Bengaluru.

Through this collaborative project, women and adolescent girls are gaining awareness, skills, and opportunities to make informed decisions about their health and challenge societal norms. By fostering entrepreneurship and empowering women economically, the project also contributes to their overall empowerment and social upliftment.

The comprehensive approach of the project, which integrates reproductive health awareness and entrepreneurship development, ensures a holistic and sustainable impact on the lives of women and girls in the identified marginalized communities. Together, CBA Services Private Limited and Smile Foundation are paving the way for a more empowered and inclusive society.
